movieDescription: Details: Directed: Shankar Bhanu Stars: Tejus Kancherla, Paayal Rajput, Dr V.K. Naresh, Nagineedu, Adityamenon Dialogues: Parashuram Lyrics: Bhaskar Bhatla Editor: Prawin Pudi Choreographer: Ganesh Swamy Executive Producer: Chinna D.O.P: C Ram Prasad Music: Radhan Co-Producer: C V Rao Producer: C Kalyan

movieInfo:
Directed by: Arjun Jandyala
Starring by: Kartikeya, Anagha, Saikumar
Genres: Action, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Guna is a happy-go-lucky youngster whose life revolves around his friends, family and the girl he loves. When he is framed for a crime he didn`t commit, Guna is left with no choice but to solve the case and prove his innocence.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Phanindra Narsetti
Starring by: Gowtam, Chandini Chowdary, John Kottoly
Genres: Mystery, Romance, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Film starts off in a bar where Nila(Chandni Chowdary) tries to woo Manu(Gautam) who is a fabulous painter. But with a small misunderstanding, the couple gets into a fight and Nila leaves the bar. On the other hand, Manu saves an old man from the clutches of three gangsters in the same bar. As time passes by, Manu comes to know that the goons are after Nila now.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Pranith Bramandapally
Starring by: Niharika Konidela, Rahul Vijay
Genres: Comedy, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Abhi(Rahul Vijay) is a simple and easy going guy who falls for a chirpy, confused and unpredictable girl called Suryakantham(Niharika). He proposes to her but the commitment-phobic Suryakantham leaves Abhi in the middle of everything and goes missing. A year passes by and Abhi moves on with his life and decides to get married to Pooja. When everything seems to be going fine, Suryakantham gets back into the life of Abhi and turns things upside down.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Nizar Shafi
Starring by: Rahman, Regina Cassandra, Havish
Genres: Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Two women file police complaints about their missing husbands, but turns out that they are in search of the same person. The case becomes more complicated when one more woman complains about the same person, who is a husband for her, too

movieInfo:
Directed by: John Stockwell
Written by: Michael Arlen Ross
Starring by: Josh Duhamel, Melissa George, Olivia Wilde
Genres: Horror, Mystery, Thriller
Country: USA
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: While traveling on vacation through the country of Northeastern of Brazil by bus, the American Alex Trubituan, his sister Bea Tribituan and their friend Amy Harrington meet the also foreigners Pru Stagler, Finn Davies and Liam Kuller after an accident with their bus. They follow a track through the woods and find a hidden paradisiacal beach. They decide to stay in the place drinking beer and dancing funk and parting with the locals and they meet the amicable Brazilian teenager Kiko.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Arjun Gunnal, Carthyk
Starring by: Meghamsh, Nakshatra, Sudarshan
Genres: Action, Comedy, Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: A 25-year-old rouge’s quest for an old Rajdooth bike. He, along with his friend backtrack the lost bike from Pochampally to Khammam to various other places in Andhra Pradesh and in the process realize their responsibilities and nitty-gritty of living a life.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Haranath Policherla
Starring by: Haranath Policherla, Suman, Puneeth Issar
Genres: Action, Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Rana Pratap(Haranath Policherla) is a sincere Army officer who goes to Pakistan to crack an undercover operation set up by Pak and China. But to his bad luck, he gets caught by the Pak Army and is sentenced to the death penalty. This is also the time when Pratap overhears a deadly attack which is being planned by Pak to destroy the city of Hyderabad in India.

movieInfo:
Directed by: N. Krishna
Starring by: Kartikeya, Digangana Suryavanshi, J. D. Chakravarthy
Genres: Action, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Hippi Devadas (Kartikeya), who is already in a relationship with a girl named Sneha, falls for her close friend Amuktamalyada (Digangana Suryavanshi) and breaks up with the first girl. After a constant pursuit by Deva, Amuktamalyada finally says yes to his proposal. The actual story begins when they both get into a serious relationship.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Hari Krishna
Starring by: Sumanth Ashwin, Nanditha, Siddhi Idnani
Genres: Comedy, Horror, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: A college student Sudheer falls for his college mate, a bubbly girl named Chitra. They even plan on getting married after graduation but Sudheer realises there’s a whole new side of her no one has seen before.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Vastav
Starring by: Ajay, Ranga, Akshata
Genres: Drama, Suspense
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Ranga(Ranga) is a mind reader who says by touching them what’s in people’s minds. Over the years he becomes a psychiatrist because of some individuals, and his only motto is to murder the individuals who made him this way. Seeing this insane scenario, a special officer(Ajay) is appointed by the police department. The rest of the story is how this special officer (Ajay) solve this mystery.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Alan Taylor
Written by: Laeta Kalogridis, Patrick Lussier
Starring by: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jason Clarke, Emilia Clarke
Genres: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi
Country: USA
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The continuing saga of humanity’s war with the machines who are led by Skynet the artificial intelligence that decided that humanity needs to be eradicated. John Connor (Jason Clarke), the one leading the human rebels against Skynet, has a plan to attack Skynet but decides not to take part in it and opts instead to prevent Skynet from implementing it’s contingency plan–to send a terminator to kill the woman who would give birth to John, Sarah Connor.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Raghu Jaya
Starring by: Vikram Sahidev, Priyanka Jain, Madhusudhan Rao
Genres: Action
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: It follows the story of four friends who face the wrath of a powerful man after their actions inadvertently result in a loss of face for him. They must now fight back against him for survival.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Bharath
Starring by: Akhil Karthik, Priyanka Sharma, Babu Mohan
Genres: Action, Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Mahan is a frustrated youth who establishes an organization called MBM(Mera Bharat Mahan)Through this, he decides to fight inefficient politicians and expose the corruption. What circumstances led him to fight against the system? How youngsters like Karthik and Sanjana helped him in this process? Will, he succeeds in this tough path? To know this, you have to watch the film on the silver screen.

movieInfo:
Directed by: P.T. Selvakumar
Starring by: Vinay Rai, Aravind Akash, Premgi Amaren
Genres: Comedy
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Billa, Ranga and Kochadaiyaan are dissatisfied with their respective marriages. Along with their friend Guru, who is about to marry, they resolve to turn bachelors once again and live life to the fullest.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Duwayne Dunham
Written by: Paul Bernbaum, Paul Bernbaum
Starring by: Debbie Reynolds, Kimberly J. Brown, Judith Hoag
Genres: Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy
Country: USA
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Marnie, Dylan, and Sophie Piper have their first out of many adventures! On Halloween, while Marnie is arguing with her mother Gwen, the kids’ grandmother Aggie comes to visit. Aggie wants to start Marnie’s witch training before her 13th birthday or Marnie will lose her powers forever. But there is another reason for Aggie’s visit. Something dark & evil is growing in Halloweentown & Aggie wants help to defeat it. While Aggie & Gwen are arguing, Aggie uses magic which Marnie observes.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Ragava
Starring by: Arya, Catherine Tresa, Madhuvanti Arun
Genres: Action, Adventure
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The film opens in a thick forest showcasing a group of tribes leading lives with their families in a happy way. On the other hand, a businessman called Mahendra(Deepraj Rana) eyes the rich natural resources in that area and plans to vacate these tribals from the forest. Gajendrudu (Arya) opposes this proposal and declares war against the big wings.
